General.Name: HPMT Holdings Bhd
General.Description: HPMT Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, manufactures and distributes cutting tools in Malaysia, rest of Asia, Europe, and internationally. It operates through three segments: Manufacturing, Trading, and Coating. The company also trades in cutting tools, supporting equipment, accessories, and other products for metalworking; and provides physical vapor deposition coating services. It distributes cutting tools under its HPMT brand, as well as under the distributors' private labels. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Shah Alam, Malaysia. HPMT Holdings Berhad is a subsidiary of Herroz Mechanical Technologies Sdn. Bhd.
